abstract: While the number of protesters remains small in many cities, organizers have been quick to establish social-media hubs for each. Here is a collection of some of the most active.
snippet: While the number of protesters remains small in many cities, organizers have been quick to establish social-media hubs for each. Here is a collection of some of the most active.
lead_paragraph: As unions tentatively throw their support behind the Occupy Wall Street protests in New York, new cities are beginning to set up their own versions.
